content.text: Build a simple project where you move a sprite with arrow keys and collect items to increase score.

items: Use key press events (when key pressed)
Increase a score variable when touching the item
Respawn the item at a random position after collection
Display the score on the stage

content.text: Create a chase game where the player avoids an enemy and survives for 30 seconds.

items: Player sprite controlled by arrow keys or WASD
Enemy sprite follows the player using
Play a sound or show a message when time is up or player is caught

content.text: When green flag clicked → set [timer] to 30 → forever: wait 1 sec, change [timer] by -1 → if touching [enemy] then stop all.
